name: typebeat
description: Sampler, synth, and sequencer designed for the QWERTY keyboard.

scripts.start: mkdir -p target/debug/samples; cp samples/* target/debug/samples; (vite ui --clearScreen false &); chokidar 'src/**/*.rs' build.rs --command 'pkill typebeat; cargo run' --initial --debounce 1000; pkill node
